citeinfo.title: Report of the Bering-Aleutian Salmon International Survey (BASIS) Working Group Meeting

abstract.p: The Bering-Aleutian Salmon International Survey (BASIS) Working Group Meeting was held on 30 May 2003 at the School of Aquatic and Fishery Sciences, University of Washington in Seattle, Washington, U.S.A.

The meeting agenda included the following:
Opening Remarks and Introductions
Meeting Procedures
Adoption of Agenda
Review of Points of Contacts for BASIS Research
Coordination of National Research Plans
Annual Implementation Plan for Joint BASIS Research
Sample and Data Exchanges; Exchanges of Scientists
Reports and Publications
Coordination and Cooperation with other Bering Sea Research Programs
Financial Support and proposals
Proposals for Future Meetings on BASIS Research
Other Business
Summary Report of the Meeting

purpose.p: To report on the Bering-Aleutian Salmon International Survey (BASIS) Working Group Meeting held in 2003
